112 
115 struct WorldSettings {
116 
118  std::string worldName = "";
119 
121  decimal persistentContactDistanceThreshold = decimal(0.03);
122 
124  decimal defaultFrictionCoefficient = decimal(0.3);
125 
127  decimal defaultBounciness = decimal(0.5);
128 
130  decimal restitutionVelocityThreshold = decimal(1.0);
131 
133  decimal defaultRollingRestistance = decimal(0.0);
134 
136  bool isSleepingEnabled = true;
137 
139  uint defaultVelocitySolverNbIterations = 10;
140 
142  uint defaultPositionSolverNbIterations = 5;
143 
145  float defaultTimeBeforeSleep = 1.0f;
146 
149  decimal defaultSleepLinearVelocity = decimal(0.02);
150 
153  decimal defaultSleepAngularVelocity = decimal(3.0) * (PI / decimal(180.0));
154 
157  int nbMaxContactManifoldsConvexShape = 1;
158 
161  int nbMaxContactManifoldsConcaveShape = 3;
162 
166  decimal cosAngleSimilarContactManifold = decimal(0.95);
167 
169  std::string to_string() const {
170 
171  std::stringstream ss;
172 
173  ss << "worldName=" << worldName << std::endl;
174  ss << "persistentContactDistanceThreshold=" << persistentContactDistanceThreshold << std::endl;
175  ss << "defaultFrictionCoefficient=" << defaultFrictionCoefficient << std::endl;
176  ss << "defaultBounciness=" << defaultBounciness << std::endl;
177  ss << "restitutionVelocityThreshold=" << restitutionVelocityThreshold << std::endl;
178  ss << "defaultRollingRestistance=" << defaultRollingRestistance << std::endl;
179  ss << "isSleepingEnabled=" << isSleepingEnabled << std::endl;
180  ss << "defaultVelocitySolverNbIterations=" << defaultVelocitySolverNbIterations << std::endl;
181  ss << "defaultPositionSolverNbIterations=" << defaultPositionSolverNbIterations << std::endl;
182  ss << "defaultTimeBeforeSleep=" << defaultTimeBeforeSleep << std::endl;
183  ss << "defaultSleepLinearVelocity=" << defaultSleepLinearVelocity << std::endl;
184  ss << "defaultSleepAngularVelocity=" << defaultSleepAngularVelocity << std::endl;
185  ss << "nbMaxContactManifoldsConvexShape=" << nbMaxContactManifoldsConvexShape << std::endl;
186  ss << "nbMaxContactManifoldsConcaveShape=" << nbMaxContactManifoldsConcaveShape << std::endl;
187  ss << "cosAngleSimilarContactManifold=" << cosAngleSimilarContactManifold << std::endl;
188 
189  return ss.str();
190  }
191 };
192 
193 }
194
